name: fe_03_04023
context_text: <A> i hate to say that but um / <B> right / <A> yeah i mean when it comes to friends and loved ones it's hard because you know you want to believe what they have to say and if somebody else is saying otherwise { well } / <B> [ right ] / <A> then you're gonna lie for em you know / <B> right / <A> um i i've always been one to say that i'd stand by my friends or family for anything and then behind closed doors me and that person can deal with whatever but / <B> right
